conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Are you dead or alive, i need
conversations.body:
Are you dead or alive, i need to know because someone came to claim
your money in your name. He said you are dead therefore she came with
some documents to c;aim the money on your behalf, So i need to know
before i will proceed. Waiting for your response...

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Are you dead or alive, i need
conversations.body:
Yes darling, but is it okay for us to have a talk right now?
Best wishes,
John

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Are you dead or alive, i need
conversations.body: Yes, I'm here.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Are you dead or alive, i need
conversations.body:
Greetings to you and your family. Let me start by introducing myself. I am
Mr. Scott N. Lamp, A representative of the Federal Bureau of Investigation
(FBI) Currently in Africa to fight against internet frauds. I will advise
you to stop dealing with those people because they are not who you think
they are and your funds worth the sum of  $10.5Million US Dollars are in
our custody and I will assist you in getting it, The same way I
assisted  Mr MacDonald B. Wayne.
Therefore I want to inform you that you are require to make a payment of
$250.00  for the paper work as  Mr MacDonald B. Wayne Have informed you on
his email, Also be inform that your funds will be transfer into your local
bank account as soon as you make the payment, So if you are ready to make
the payment I want you to get back to me with the below   information.
Full Names :
Address :
Country :
State:
Telephone Number :
Cell Phone Number :
Age :
Valid ID: .......Compulsory
Or Drivers License:
Marital Status :
Occupation :
First Email :
Second Email :
After I receive the above details and confirmed by me, I will give you
instructions on how to make the payment of $250.00  for the paperwork and
legal documentation. As soon as the payment is made, I will get the
documents done then the bank will contact you for your funds transfer into
your bank account without any further delay.
Important Notice; Do not respond to any emails apart from myself, and
forward all further emails you get from those scammers to me, so I can work
with the local police, The FBI and Interpol to bring them down.
I wait to hear from you today, I say very big Congratulations to you once
more.
Yours in Service,
Mr. Scott N.Lamp .
(F B I) Representative
(Compensation Officer)ng is in your hand and I want you the sober truth and
nothing but the truth, I have also attached and send to your view my
working ID CARD, for you to know who you are dealing with, and also for
future reference.
I am giving you 100% Assurance and Guarantee that you will receive your
$10.5Million the same way Mr Macdonald Bruce Wayne received his own fund.
I want to remind you that the process will take 3/4 days, You will receive
your funds without any further delay as soon as you pay the required fee.
Regarding the email we are using, We chose to use Gmail as we can not
access our official domain as a result of poor network here and IP
differences.
Yours in Service,
Mr. Scott Lamp

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: Are you dead or alive, i need
conversations.body:
Attn: John
I am so sorry for the late response, We don't work on weekends. Working
days are from Monday to Friday, Saturday is half, I hope you understand.
The content of your email is well understood and my past record are there,
Maybe I will advise you to contact Mr Macdonald Bruce Wayne whom I helped
few month ago to Interview him about me And How he received his fund, Look
I feel bad seeing people doing all kind of silly things just to fleece
innocent people their hard earn income, Please this is not the same thing
as what you may be thinking on the contrary, I want you to repose your
confidence in me and give me your trust and see if I will fail you.
I will prove a point to you and you will later testify to people that truly
good people still exist even in the midst of gullible ones, Everything is
in your hand and I want you the sober truth and nothing but the truth, I
have also attached and send to your view my working ID CARD, for you to
know who you are dealing with, and also for future reference.
I am giving you 100% Assurance and Guarantee that you will receive your
$10.5Million the same way Mr Macdonald Bruce Wayne received his own fund.
I want to remind you that the process will take 3/4 days, You will receive
your funds without any further delay as soon as you pay the required fee.
Yours in Service,
Mr. Scott N. Lamp
